cast.overview: When Sosuke, a young boy who lives on a clifftop overlooking the sea, rescues a stranded goldfish named Ponyo, he discovers more than he bargained for. Ponyo is a curious, energetic young creature who yearns to be human, but even as she causes chaos around the house, her father, a powerful sorcerer, schemes to return Ponyo to the sea.
cast.title: Ponyo

also_known_as: いしずみ あきひこ
details.biography: Akihiko Ishizumi (石住 昭彦, Ishizumi Akihiko, October 25, 1961) is a Japanese actor and voice actor (seiyuu) from Ehime Prefecture. He is affiliated with Engeki Shuudan En (Theatrical Group EN).
details.name: Akihiko Ishizumi
